Package com.nv.util

This package contains all classes for various types of non-visual utility related components.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AppUtil Utility class that provides common functionality for resource allocation/deallocation and general management regarding the entire application.
BeanUtility This class provides the ability to create beans, dynamically access bean properties, and invoke bean methods using introspection.
DateStringComparator A Comparison implementation to provide custom logic as to how two String date values are compared to one another.
GeneralUtil General purpose utility class.
NumericStringComparator A Comparison implementation to provide custom logic as to how two String numeric values are compared to one another.
PrintJobWatcher  
PrintPreview Add print preview functionality to any Swing Text component.
PrintUtility This is a utility for printing the contents of the Swing components
TextComponentPrintable  
 

Exception Summary
AppInitException An exception class for handling application intialization errors.
ComponentPrintingException An exception class for handling Swing component printing errors.
 

Package com.nv.util Description

This package contains all classes for various types of non-visual utility related components.
